mapper.select:
select * from ( SELECT A.ROW_ID AS "partnerId", A.NAME AS "name", A.MISC_FLG as "targetCustomerFlag", A.CUST_STAT_CD AS "status", B.X_EXSNYC_FLAG AS "snycFlg", B.X_ATTRIB_133 AS "accountLevel", B.ATTRIB_50 AS "accountType", B.X_ATTRIB_103 AS "province", B.X_ATTRIB_104 AS "city", B.X_ATTRIB_110 AS "area", D.LAST_NAME AS "salerName", E.LOGIN AS "salerLogin", A.PR_POSTN_ID as "salerPositionId", G.VAL AS "businessCenter", ROUND(J.ATTRIB_22, 2) AS "sales", ROUND(H.X_ATTRIB_101, 2) AS "target", ROUND(I.JIEYONG_AMOUNT, 2) AS "borrow", ROUND(I.RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 2) AS "receipt", L.NAME AS "industry", NVL2(K.ROW_ID, 'Y', 'N') AS "collectionFlag", K.ROW_ID AS "collectionId", A.CREATED as "created", ROUND(A.HIST_SLS_VOL,2) AS "histSlsVol", M.ZSD_KEY08 as "receivableTrouble", M.ZSD_KEY10 as "borrowTrouble", M.ZSD_KEY04 as "unresolvedTrouble", M.ZSD_KEY09 as "backLetterTrouble"
FROM SIEBEL.S_ORG_EXT A
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_ORG_EXT_X B ON A.ROW_ID = B.PAR_ROW_ID
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_POSTN C ON A.PR_POSTN_ID = C.ROW_ID
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_CONTACT D ON C.PR_EMP_ID = D.ROW_ID
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_USER E ON C.PR_EMP_ID = E.ROW_ID
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_ORG_EXT F ON A.BU_ID = F.ROW_ID
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_LST_OF_VAL G ON F.NAME = G.NAME AND G.TYPE = 'HIK_BRANCH_CENTER'
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_ORG_EXT_XM H ON H.PAR_ROW_ID = A.ROW_ID AND H.X_ATTRIB_99 = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND H.TYPE = 'Partner BP - NonDist'
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.CX_ACCOUNT_SAP I ON B.ATTRIB_44 = I.SAP_ID AND SOURCE = 'GNYX'
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_ORG_EXT_XM J ON J.PAR_ROW_ID = A.ROW_ID AND J.NAME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '年海康实际采购额' AND J.TYPE = 'Purchase Analysis'
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_ORG_EXT_XM K ON K.PAR_ROW_ID = A.ROW_ID AND K.ATTRIB_01 = '1-PD6NCH' AND K.TYPE = 'Collection'
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.S_INDUST L ON B.X_ATTRIB_115 = L.ROW_ID
LEFT JOIN SIEBEL.T_SALES_WARNING M ON A.ROW_ID = M.ROW_ID
WHERE (A.SRV_PROVDR_FLG = 'Y' OR A.PRTNR_FLG = 'Y') )
